operations.name: UI Lifecycle
operations.brief: Operations that represent the loading of a UI.

operations.name: Actions
operations.brief: Operations that represent UI actions that are initiated by the user (e.g., mouse clicks).

operations.name: Tasks
operations.brief: Operations that represent generic UI tasks that might be affecting performance on the UI thread.

operations.name: React
operations.brief: Operations that represent work done by the React UI framework.

operations.name: Vue
operations.brief: Operations that represent work done by the Vue UI framework.

operations.name: Svelte
operations.brief: Operations that represent work done by the Svete UI framework.

operations.name: Angular
operations.brief: Operations that represent work done by the Angular UI framework.

operations.name: Ember
operations.brief: Operations that represent work done by the Ember UI framework.
